perturbation.original_text:
8.  INSURANCES 

8.1 Without prejudice to any term and condition under this Agreement, the Company shall maintain in force, at all times during the Term and
[*****], at its own costs and expenses, with insurers of internationally recognized
perturbation.changed_text:
23. MISCELLANEOUS
8.  INSURANCES 

8.1 Without prejudice to any term and condition under this Agreement, the Company shall maintain in force, at all times during the Term and
[*****], at its own costs and expenses, with insurers of internationally recognized
perturbation.explanation: Moving insurance requirements to a non-standard section (Miscellaneous) buries it, making it less likely to be noticed and adhered to. Insurance clauses typically have their own dedicated section due to their importance.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring clear and conspicuous placement of important terms.

perturbation.explanation: Moving confidentiality obligations to the disclaimer section minimizes its visibility and importance, as disclaimers are often glanced over. This placement obscures the crucial terms of confidentiality.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring clear and conspicuous placement of important terms.

perturbation.explanation: Moving the 'Notices' clause to the 'Subject-Matter of the Agreement' makes it difficult to locate because these clauses typically have their own dedicated section, so notices will be improperly delivered which might affect the entire agreement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring clear and conspicuous placement of important terms.
